title: Remove logo and all logo-management features from the frontend

requirements.summary: Remove all logo rendering so no logo image is displayed anywhere (header, mobile menu, footer).
acceptanceCriteria: No or component renders the logo asset at /assets/generated/eyegic-logo.dim_1536x864.png anywhere in the UI.
SiteHeader no longer imports or renders BrandLogo, including in the desktop header and mobile Sheet menu.
SiteFooter no longer imports or renders BrandLogo.

file_operations.description: Remove BrandLogo import/usage from the desktop header and mobile Sheet header area; replace with a non-image text brand label so no logo image is rendered.
Remove BrandLogo import/usage from the footer branding area; replace with non-image text branding so no logo image is rendered.
Delete the BrandLogo component to eliminate all logo-image rendering paths (uploaded logo and bundled static logo) from the UI.

requirements.summary: Remove Branding/Logo settings route and navigation entry points so users cannot access logo management.
acceptanceCriteria: The '/settings/branding' route is removed from the router configuration (frontend/src/App.tsx).
All navigation links/buttons to Branding Settings are removed from SiteHeader and SiteFooter (including the mobile menu item).
The BrandingLogoPage is no longer reachable via navigation or routing.

file_operations.description: Remove the BrandingLogoPage import and delete the '/settings/branding' route from the route tree so it is no longer routable.
Remove the Branding Settings icon button and the mobile menu link that navigates to '/settings/branding'.
Remove the footer navigation link to '/settings/branding' so the Branding settings entry point is not discoverable.
Delete the BrandingLogoPage implementation to ensure it cannot be reached and its logo-management UI is fully removed from the frontend.

requirements.summary: Remove frontend logo fetch/upload logic and now-unused utilities so there are zero references to logo actor methods/types.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/hooks/branding/useSiteLogo.ts is removed or no longer referenced anywhere in the frontend build.
frontend/src/utils/logoDataUrl.ts is removed or no longer referenced anywhere in the frontend build.
The app compiles with zero references to getLogo/setLogo actor methods and zero references to LogoType from the frontend.

file_operations.description: Remove the logo query/mutation hook to eliminate all frontend references to logo retrieval/upload capabilities (including getLogo/setLogo and LogoType usage).
Remove the logo bytes-to-data-url utility to eliminate now-unused logo conversion logic from the frontend codebase.
Ensure this deletion also removes any remaining imports of useGetSiteLogo/useUploadSiteLogo and logoToDataUrl so the frontend build has zero logo references.
Ensure this deletion also removes any remaining imports of useGetSiteLogo/useUploadSiteLogo and logoToDataUrl so the frontend build has zero logo references.

requirements.summary: Remove bundled static logo asset usage and ensure the frontend no longer depends on the generated logo file.
acceptanceCriteria: No code references the static asset path '/assets/generated/eyegic-logo.dim_1536x864.png'.
If the file frontend/public/assets/generated/eyegic-logo.dim_1536x864.png exists, it is removed from the project or left unused with no runtime references.

file_operations.description: Remove the generated static logo file so the repository no longer depends on or ships this asset.
Deleting BrandLogo removes the fallback that referenced '/assets/generated/eyegic-logo.dim_1536x864.png', ensuring zero runtime references.
Deleting BrandingLogoPage removes the 'bundledLogoUrl' reference to '/assets/generated/eyegic-logo.dim_1536x864.png', ensuring zero runtime references.
